text: Hello! I am Techverse Assistant. How can I help you today?
Techverse is a student-run technical club focused on learning and building projects in software, AI, and hardware.

To join Techverse, attend one of our weekly meetings or fill out the membership form shared in our announcements. Membership is open to all students; look for the 'Join' link on our website or contact the club officers via email.
The students of techverse club manage techverse. They handle all the activities and events organized by the club. faculty members also contribute to managing the club.
